solutionCode:
# Dictionary Mastery

# Create base character
var character = {
    "name": "Warrior",
    "class": "Fighter",
    "level": 1
}

print("=== Character Creation ===")
print("Name: ", character["name"])

# Add stats dynamically
character["health"] = 100
character["strength"] = 15
character["defense"] = 10
print("Stats added!")

# Check for optional stats
if "mana" in character:
    print("Mana: ", character["mana"])
else:
    print("No mana (not a spellcaster)")

# Merge equipment bonuses
var equipment_bonus = {
    "strength": 5,  # Will add to existing
    "defense": 3,
    "critical_chance": 10  # New stat
}

print("\nEquipping gear...")
for key in equipment_bonus.keys():
    if key in character:
        character[key] += equipment_bonus[key]
        print("+", equipment_bonus[key], " to ", key)
    else:
        character[key] = equipment_bonus[key]
        print("Gained new stat: ", key)

# Display all stats
print("\n=== Final Stats ===")
for key in character.keys():
    print(key, ": ", character[key])
hints: Use 'in' to check if key exists
Handle new vs existing keys differently
